name: override_skin_model
description: What skin model to use for the character
label: Skin model
items: Do not set a skin material, no matter what is said in the preset
Use the skin model specified in the preset
Use a simple material for the skin, without any particular procedural aspects
Use the enhanced skin, which adds a few procedural aspects and which has been the default in MPFB1/MPFB2 until mid 2023
